data.event: Stanford was founded in 1775 by Benjamin Logan as Logan's Fort, alternately known as St. Asaph, the name given it by Logan.

event.title: is still used to this day

data.event: The name "Fort Logan" is still used to this day by local businesses, including the Fort Logan Hospital and Standing Fort Collectibles.
In 1781, the original settlement expanded when Benjamin Logan donated part of his own land as the site for a courthouse.
